title: 1.8水龙头服 ess插件不工作
author: 2000a
txt_content: 后台显示 Essentials not installed or failed to load. Essenials Protect is in emergency mode now.

replies.author: 2000a
replies.txt_content: ess的另一条错误信息Error occurred while enabling Essentials v2.13.1

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content:
Essentials not installed or failed to load. Essenials Protect is in emergency mode now.
这个一般是版本错误导致的

1.8的ess似乎需要你自己去国外网站找

replies.author: prozhong
replies.txt_content: 这是国外的文章，如何获得最新版支持1.8的ess

replies.author: mingtfarc
replies.txt_content: 我上传1.8版本的ESS到度娘盘了，下载地址已经发给LZ
